      • waitForPlayerInput

        public java.lang.String waitForPlayerInput(java.lang.String message)
        This method is synchronized and has wait(); method inside. It is setting the message to be displayed to the user and is waiting for user to insert an input into the JTextField.
        Parameters:
        message - message to be displayed to the user
        Returns:
        this method returns 'String input' with users input inside

      • realeseTheLock

        public void realeseTheLock()
        This method is using notifyAll(); method inside and is changing boolean playerInputEmpty to false when used

      • setMargin

        public void setMargin(java.lang.String margin)
        This method is setting and adding amount of margin to be added to the JTextArea. You must pass /r as String margin for a single margin or /r/r for double margin.
        Parameters:
        margin - amount of margin to be added to the textArea.
